thread.section_title: Flashbay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flashbay | flashbay.com.au
thread.title: Martin Fernandez

author: Martin Fernandez
title: Martin Fernandez
text:
The customer service and friendly professional assistance that Alex provided was great! We received demo packs which we were impressed with and it helped us make a decision to move forward with our order.
We are more than happy with the quality of the product and will be using Flashbay again. In fact today!
Martin Fernandez
Operations Manager
Vision Technology Systems
